link.title: WBS COVID Support
link.script:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.h2: Support & Resources for the WBS Community

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The purpose of this website is to gather information and resources regarding COVID-19 to help to support the West Bath School community.

span.a: Sign-Up for Breakfast and Lunch Delivery for West Bath Children Under the age of 18
Resources for Food in the Greater Bath Community
Visit this page to access resource articles, on-line activities, and off-line activities

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Bath Family YMCA is offering weekly childcare for children of essential employees. Click here for more information.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.a: Maine Department of Education's Resources for Parents
Sagadahoc County Emergency Management Facebook Page
Sagadahoc Area Resources for COVID-19 Response
